embeds.title: HACK ARMOUR RULES
embeds.description: There are some rules you need to follow before talking in the Hack Armour Discord server...

fields.name: General Rules 😃
fields.value:
**1.** Respect https://discordapp.com/terms and https://discordapp.com/guidelines
**2.** Respect each other - hate speech, racism, homophobia, bullying or toxic behavior are not tolerated here.
**3.** No controversial topics - this includes, but is not limited to politics, religion or other heavy subjects.
**4.** No NSFW (not safe for work) content is allowed on the server.
**5.** No spam - this includes, but is not limited to posting walls, excessive pings, emote or image spam, raiding, abusing spoiler tags, malicious links, etc.
**6.** Self-advertising and begging/asking for free stuff are not allowed - this includes DMs.
**7.** Outside of language channels, keep all communication in English.
**8.** Malicious use of alts to give yourself an unfair advantage, disrupt the server or to avoid bans is forbidden. Alts are only allowed for testing purposes.
**9.** Interfering with staff’s duties by arguing, misinforming them or giving false evidence is forbidden.
**10.** No Ship Toasting in #general

fields.name: Voice Chat Rules 👋
fields.value:
**11.** Recording conversations in voice channels, without the explicit consent of all participants, is forbidden.
**12.** Playing annoying music, earrape, using soundboards or purposefully making annoying noises in voice channels is forbidden.

fields.name: Profile Rules 🤷‍♂️
fields.value:
**13.** Impersonating staff members, other server members or bots is forbidden.
**14.** Offensive nicknames, statuses or profile pictures are forbidden
**15.** Advertising in your nickname is forbidden.
**16.** No unsolicited dms
